scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch --prefix server" "npm start --prefix client"
scripts.setup:local: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --prefix client && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --prefix client; npm run lint --prefix server;
scripts.test:all: CI=true npm run test --prefix client; CI=true npm run test --prefix server;
